```{r}
# nonlinear time effects & interaction with treatment
fm_s311_pro <- lme(pro ~ ns(time, 3) * treat, data = prothro,
                    random = list(id = pdDiag(form = ~ ns(time, 3))))

plot(fm_s311_pro, resid(., type = "p", level = 0) ~ time, type = c("p", "smooth"),
     lwd = 3)
```
